title: Fenrir Ni Tensei Shita Hazu Ga Dou Mitemo Shiba Inu - Shiba Inu (Saikyou) Ni Natta Ore, Mofumofu Sare Nagara Kami E To Nariagaru
alternative_title: Fenrir ni Tensei shita Hazu ga Dou Mitemo Shiba Inu: Shiba Inu (Saikyou) ni Natta Ore, Mofumofu sare Nagara Kami e to Nariagaru ; I Was Supposed to Be Reincarnated as Fenrir, but No Matter How You Look at It I'm a Shiba Inu - I Became (The Strongest) Shiba Inu, and I'm Rising to Godhood While Getting Fluffed ; Fenrir ni Tensei shita Hazu ga Dou Mitemo Shiba Inu ; I Was Supposed to Be Reincarnated as Fenrir, but No Matter How You Look At It, I'm a Shiba Inu
status: Fenrir ni Tensei shita Hazu ga Dou Mitemo Shiba Inu: Shiba Inu (Saikyou) ni Natta Ore, Mofumofu sare Nagara Kami e to Nariagaru ; I Was Supposed to Be Reincarnated as Fenrir, but No Matter How You Look at It I'm a Shiba Inu - I Became (The Strongest) Shiba Inu, and I'm Rising to Godhood While Getting Fluffed ; Fenrir ni Tensei shita Hazu ga Dou Mitemo Shiba Inu ; I Was Supposed to Be Reincarnated as Fenrir, but No Matter How You Look At It, I'm a Shiba Inu
description:
Description :
        Tarou, an office worker, saves a wolf-like creature from being run over by a truck and loses his life. When he arrives in another world, a capricious goddess reincarnates him as Fenrir, the strongest holy wolf on the inside and a Shiba Inu on the outside. Taro meets Princess Sophia, who has been praying to Fenrir, believing him to be the messenger of salvation, and sets off on an adventurous journey...?!
